data.current_description:
Adds a comment to a [VTEX DO](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/vtex-do--7KMbRL4OslN8DTX9oiuCiu) task, filtering by task ID.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [License Manager resources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Adds a comment to a VTEX DO task identified by the task ID. The comment text is provided in the request body. This operation allows task collaborators to add notes and updates to task discussions. Returns the created comment object with metadata including the comment ID, author, timestamp, and content. The task's update timestamp is automatically updated when a comment is added.
data.reasoning: The current description is vague about what inputs are required (comment text content), what the response contains, and what side effects occur (task update timestamp changes). The description lacks clarity on the request body structure and response format, which are critical for AI agents to understand how to construct requests and interpret responses. Added details about input expectations, response structure, and side effects to improve AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'NewNote' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is too generic. Description mentions limitations but lacks clarity on required inputs (order ID), what the operation returns, and the relationship between notes and orders. Improved version specifies inputs, outputs, and constraints for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description:
Creates a new note in [VTEX DO](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/vtex-do--7KMbRL4OslN8DTX9oiuCiu). Be aware of the following limitations:

- The maximum number of notes for an order is 30.

- The maximum number of characters in a note's description is 2000.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [License Manager resources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.summary_suggestion: Create a new note for an order
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new note associated with a specific order in VTEX DO. Expects an order ID and note description in the request body. Returns the created note object with its ID and metadata. Note: Maximum 30 notes per order; description limited to 2000 characters.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description mentions limitations but lacks clarity on required inputs (order ID), what the operation returns, and the relationship between notes and orders. Improved version specifies inputs, outputs, and constraints for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'NewTask' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is too generic. Description lacks essential information about required inputs (task fields), what gets returned, and the purpose context (order processing). Enhanced version clarifies inputs, outputs, and the operational context for better AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description:
Creates a new task in [VTEX DO](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/vtex-do--7KMbRL4OslN8DTX9oiuCiu). 

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [License Manager resources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.summary_suggestion: Create a new task in VTEX DO
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new task in VTEX DO for order management. Expects task details such as title, description, assignee, and target (order ID) in the request body. Returns the created task object with its ID, status, and metadata. Tasks can be assigned to authorized users for processing orders.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description lacks essential information about required inputs (task fields), what gets returned, and the purpose context (order processing). Enhanced version clarifies inputs, outputs, and the operational context for better AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'Listtasksbyassignee' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary is too generic and doesn't convey the filtering capability. Description is verbose with examples but lacks clarity on what gets returned and how to choose between filtering options. Improved version clarifies the multiple filtering strategies, return type, and parameters for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description:
This endpoint allows you to filter [VTEX DO](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/vtex-do--7KMbRL4OslN8DTX9oiuCiu) tasks. You can choose between the following filtering options:

- **Assignees:** using `assignee.email` and `status`. Example: `https://{{accountName}}.{{environment}}.com.br/api/do/tasks?assignee.email={{person@email.com}}&status={{open}}`. 

- **Targets:** using `targetId` and `status`. Example: `https://{{accountName}}.{{environment}}.com.br/api/do/tasks?target.id={{name}}&status={{open}}`. 

- **Paged tasks:** using `page`, `perPage` and `status`. Example: `https://{{accountName}}.{{environment}}.com.br/api/do/tasks?page={{1}}&perPage={{10}}&status=;{{-Closed}}`. 

- **Context:** using `context`, `page`, `perPage` and `status`. Example: `https://{{accountName}}.{{environment}}.com.br/api/do/tasks?context={{context}}&page={{1}}&perPage={{10}}&status={{-Closed}}`. 

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [License Manager resources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.summary_suggestion: List and filter tasks by multiple criteria
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of VTEX DO tasks with flexible filtering options. Supports filtering by: assignee email and status, target (order) ID and status, pagination (page/perPage) with status, or context with pagination. Returns a paginated collection of task objects. Use status parameter to filter by task state (e.g., 'open', 'closed').
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic and doesn't convey the filtering capability. Description is verbose with examples but lacks clarity on what gets returned and how to choose between filtering options. Improved version clarifies the multiple filtering strategies, return type, and parameters for better AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'EditTask' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original summary is too generic. Description states 'updates the status' but doesn't clarify what other fields can be updated or what gets returned. Improved version specifies that multiple properties can be updated (not just status), clarifies the return value, and provides context on status values for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description:
Updates the status of a [VTEX DO](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/vtex-do--7KMbRL4OslN8DTX9oiuCiu) task, filtering by task ID.

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [License Manager resources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.description_suggestion: Updates a VTEX DO task identified by task ID. Allows modification of task status and other task properties via the request body. Returns the updated task object with its new status and metadata. Common status values include 'open' and 'closed'.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic. Description states 'updates the status' but doesn't clarify what other fields can be updated or what gets returned. Improved version specifies that multiple properties can be updated (not just status), clarifies the return value, and provides context on status values for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description:
This endpoint allows you to filter [VTEX DO](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/vtex-do--7KMbRL4OslN8DTX9oiuCiu) tasks. You can choose between the following filtering options:

- **Assignees:** using `assignee.email` and `status`. Example: `https://{{accountName}}.{{environment}}.com.br/api/do/tasks?assignee.email={{person@email.com}}&status={{open}}`. 

- **Targets:** using `targetId` and `status`. Example: `https://{{accountName}}.{{environment}}.com.br/api/do/tasks?target.id={{name}}&status={{open}}`. 

- **Paged tasks:** using `page`, `perPage` and `status`. Example: `https://{{accountName}}.{{environment}}.com.br/api/do/tasks?page={{1}}&perPage={{10}}&status=;{{-Closed}}`. 

- **Context:** using `context`, `page`, `perPage` and `status`. Example: `https://{{accountName}}.{{environment}}.com.br/api/do/tasks?context={{context}}&page={{1}}&perPage={{10}}&status={{-Closed}}`. 

## Permissions

This endpoint does not require [License Manager resources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3).
data.summary_suggestion: List and filter tasks by multiple criteria
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of VTEX DO tasks with flexible filtering options. Supports filtering by: assignee email and status, target (order) ID and status, pagination (page/perPage) with status, or context with pagination. Returns a paginated collection of task objects. Use status parameter to filter by task state (e.g., 'open', 'closed').
data.reasoning: Original summary is too generic and doesn't convey the filtering capability. Description is verbose with examples but lacks clarity on what gets returned and how to choose between filtering options. Improved version clarifies the multiple filtering strategies, return type, and parameters for better AI agent interpretability.
